name: Strawberrai
description:
Why would a samurai train by chopping up flying fruit..? 

Who knows?!    Who cares?!     Leave no fruit un-sliced!

Project Strawberrai is a single-player game for the Oculus/Meta Quest 2, where you, a mysterious samurai who chops up flying fruit, must. chop. more. fruit! As you ascend the ranks of student to sensei, discover what dark truths motivate your enigmatic, fruit-slicing frenzy.

Controls:

Left / Right Grip: Grab your weapon!

Left Menu Button: In-Game Menu

Planned Updates:

More Weapons! More Levels! More Polish!

Credits :

Programming - Tyrone Jemison

Game Design - Les Covarrubias

Music - @WickedHarmony_

Art - Eric Reed
